abilities.name: α Growth
abilities.effect: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon (except with an attack, Ability, or Trainer card), you may attach 2 Energy cards.

attacks.name: Gather Strength
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 4 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Water Energy and a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.
